wikitext.*:
<noinclude>Only for {{tl|近期已故现实人物}}.</noinclude><includeonly><!--{if !isset($wgDeceasedPerson) || !$wgDeceasedPerson}--><!--{assign var="wgDeceasedPerson" value=true scope="global"}--><style>
html {
    filter: grayscale(100%);
    -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
    -moz-filter: grayscale(100%);
    -ms-filter: grayscale(100%);
    -o-filter: grayscale(100%)
}

.please-donate {
    display: none !important;
}

#firstHeadingSpan {
    border: 1px solid #333
}</style><script>window.RLQ = window.RLQ || [];
window.RLQ.push(function() {
    $(function() {
        var firstHeadingSpan = $("<span/>");
        firstHeadingSpan.attr("id", "firstHeadingSpan");
        var firstHeading = $("#firstHeading");
        firstHeadingSpan.html(firstHeading.html());
        firstHeading.empty().append(firstHeadingSpan);
    });
});</script><!--{/if}--></includeonly>
